attachments_source.description: One or more configuration blocks describing attachments sources to a version of a document. Defined below.

content.description: The JSON or YAML content of the document.

document_format.description: The format of the document. Valid document types include: `JSON` and `YAML`

document_type.description: The type of the document. Valid document types include: `Automation`, `Command`, `Package`, `Policy`, and `Session`

permissions.description: Additional Permissions to attach to the document. See [Permissions](#permissions

target_type.description: The target type which defines the kinds of resources the document can run on. For example, /AWS::EC2::Instance. For a list of valid resource types, see AWS Resource Types Reference (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-template-resource-type-ref.html)

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the object.

created_date.description: The date the document was created.

schema_version.description: The schema version of the document.

default_version.description: The default version of the document.

hash.description: The sha1 or sha256 of the document content

hash_type.description: "Sha1" "Sha256". The hashing algorithm used when hashing the content.

latest_version.description: The latest version of the document.

owner.description: The AWS user account of the person who created the document.

status.description: "Creating", "Active" or "Deleting". The current status of the document.

parameter.description: The parameters that are available to this document.

platform_types.description: A list of OS platforms compatible with this SSM document, either "Windows" or "Linux".
